alert.note: Alert for Adair; Audubon; Cass; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with strong wind will impact portions of Cass, southwestern Guthrie, southern Audubon and Adair Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Griswold, or 11 miles southeast of Atlantic, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlantic, Greenfield, Anita, Exira, Adair, Fontanelle, Lewis, Casey, Orient, Massena, Cumberland, Bridgewater, Brayton, Marne, Wiota, Lake Anita State Park, Greenfield Municipal Airport, Nodaway Park, Atlantic Municipal Airport and Anita Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern and west central Iowa.
